import * as React from "react"; import SpeedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Speed'; import { Line } from "react-chartjs-2"; import currency from "../../utils/formatCurrency"; import {Chart, ArcElement} from 'chart.js' Chart.register(ArcElement); const labels = [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', ]; const data = { labels: labels, datasets: [{ label: 'Monthly Payment Report', borderColor: 'rgba(16, 172, 126, 1)', data: [25000, 51900, 808067, 80900, 56500, 110000, 40310], }] }; const config = { type: 'line', data: data, responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: true, options: {} }; const FronDeskDashboard = () => { return (

Dashboard

{currency(49028400)}

Total Income this Month

{currency(48400)}

Total Income this Today

83

Inactive Buses

Total Passengere Today

{/* */}
); }; export default FronDeskDashboard;
